name: Satoshi Tsujimoto
content: TSUJIMOTO, Satoshi (English) [Japanese] Professor Satoshi TSUJIMOTO Applied Mathematics and Physics Course Graduate School of Informatics Kyoto University Yoshida-Honmachi, Sakyo-ku, Kyoto 606-8501, Japan e-mail: tsujimoto.satoshi.5s _at_ kyoto-u.jp Office: Room 316, 3F, Research Bldg.
